scan_type_descriptions: dynamic susceptibility contrast, perfusion weighted imaging (DSC, PWI) MRI
diffusion tensor imaging (DTI, DTI-MRI, Diffusion MRI)
mean diffusivity (MD), apparent diffusion coefficient (ADC) MRI
Magnetization Prepared Rapid Gradient Echo (MPRAGE, MP-RAGE) MRI
percentage of baseline at peak (PBP) MRI
susceptibility weighted imaging (SWI), Phase-enhanced imaging MRI
Fluid Attenuation Inversion Recovery (FLAIR), fluid-suppressed inversion recovery MRI
time to peak (TTP), Peak Enhancement Time, Time to Maximum, Tmax MRI
